paragraphs: Hey there! Iâ€™m Deepthi, a passionate engineer with a love for AI, innovation, and community building. From building accessible tech for social good to representing India at Microsoft global summits, Iâ€™m all about using technology to empower lives.

Currently a Software Engineering Intern at Honeywell and a Gold-level Microsoft Student Ambassador, Iâ€™ve delivered 20+ workshops, mentored global peers, and led award-winning projects. Let's connect and create something impactful together!

items.name: Hearing the World
